description:
A small tool to convert UIF image files to ISO image files.

UIF to ISO is a free software that can convert UIF image format to ISO image format. UIF is the abbreviation for "Universal Image Format", a strong compression and encryption of CD/DVD image file format, generally produced by the Magic ISO Maker. You can simply select the file you want to convert, then press the "Convert" button to start conversion, the default generated ISO file have the same file name with the original file, just the file extension is ".iso", easy to use so much.
